Taxon.name: Measure.Pressure.Differential.Static
Taxon.mtc:Definition: This test process measures the pneumatic differential pressure between two points generated by the unit under test. The resulting pressure difference will return in the unit of measure as defined in the test point?s data. Note: Although the unit of measure can be read from the test point?s unit of measure it is good practice to pass the Unit of Measure to the test process as a parameter to avoid confusion when synchronizing data between systems. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pressure_measurement https://www.nxp.com/docs/en/application-note/AN1573.pdf?&srch=1
